TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpModuleBase extends System.Object implements class System.Web.IHttpModule

Docs.summary: The base class from which HTTP modules that are configurable with the [\<system.identityModel.services\>](../Topic/%3Csystem.identityModel.services%3E.md) element () derive.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases the resources (except memory) used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Override this method in your derived class to release resources. The default implementation is empty.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the object that is in effect for the current module.
Docs.value: The object that is in effect for the current module.
Docs.exception: An attempt to set the property to occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Init(class System.Web.HttpApplication context) cil managed

Docs.param: The application object which contains this module.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method implements the <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method by initializing the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property to the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, invoking the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> method, and then invoking the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> method.
Derived classes override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void InitializeModule(class System.Web.HttpApplication context) cil managed

Docs.param: The application object which contains this module.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, initializes the current module and prepares it to handle events from its ASP.NET application object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the InitializeModule method to load any additional configuration state as well as to register event handling methods with specific events raised by the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object. When this method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A> method, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property has already been initialized. You can get the configuration object that is in effect for this module from this property. The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property should be used for all token processing in this module.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, initializes module properties based on values in the object that is in effect for it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When this method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A> method, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property has already been initialized. You can get the configuration object that is in effect for this module from this property.
